Network Provider
--requires either
  --android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION
  --android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION

GPS Provider
--requires
  --android.permission.ACCES_FINE_LOCATION

Passive Provider
--returns locations generated by other providers
--requires
  android.permission.ACCESS_FIND_LOCATION

LocationManager: system service for accessing location data
--getSystemService(Context.LOCATION_SERVICE)

LocationListener
--void onLocationChanged(Location location)
--void onProviderDisalbed(String provider)
--void onProviderEnabled(String provider)
--void onStatusChange(String provider, int status, Bundle extras)
